item.description:
Second Meeting. (Oil Addicts Anonymous?)

Surely we'll speak more about peak oil, solar hot water systems, high pressure solar electrolysis, hydrogen conversions for cars, and replacing the 100-year-old boiler. We may even conceive an open source technology project.

Cheers. - Josh

The restaurant, WOK, is on Rt9 Eastbound, just west of I95.

Need a ride? Let me know and I'll help you find a carpool.

You'll have no trouble finding us in there. The place is small, we'll have the only large table, and that table is right there when you enter the seating area.


For more information, see http://boston.citysea...
item.name: Boston Area Alternative Energy Supporters Meetup
